assumptions.label: 2025 unit count (low scenario)
assumptions.notes: Mix includes 65 chassis and 27 dry vans in the low-case fleet build.

assumptions.label: 2025 unit count (high scenario)
assumptions.notes: Mix includes 80 chassis and 40 dry vans in the high-case fleet build.

assumptions.label: Baseline utilization
assumptions.notes: Projection tables model 100% utilization with sensitivity shown at 95% and 90%.

assumptions.label: Average monthly rental rate (2025)
assumptions.notes: Applied to both low and high cases for 2025 rental revenue projections.

assumptions.label: Average monthly rental rate (2028, low)
assumptions.notes: Low-case average monthly rate by 2028 in the rental revenue model.

assumptions.label: Average monthly rental rate (2028, high)
assumptions.notes: High-case average monthly rate by 2028 in the rental revenue model.

assumptions.label: 2028 unit count (low scenario)
assumptions.notes: Low-case fleet ramp in the unit growth table.

assumptions.label: 2028 unit count (high scenario)
assumptions.notes: High-case fleet ramp in the unit growth table.

risks.label: Equipment supply chain disruptions
risks.mitigation: Diversify suppliers and maintain inventory buffers.

auditTrail.author: Lead Engineer
auditTrail.change: Populated assumptions with fleet, pricing, and utilization inputs from Mainland Truck projection tables.
auditTrail.rationale: Align assumptions register with source projections for scenario modeling.
